text: Went to see “Hongzhangliang’s dreamscape of creation” and got to experience the baking cookies class!!  The class is different from normal cookies classes as it teaches us to make cookies using the “clay marbling” technique that the artist uses to create his artpiece. A fun and enjoyable time with friends and family

Stepping into the gallery for the first time, I didn’t expect much, being someone who doesn’t often engage with art. Yet, the visual beauty offered a rare calmness and serenity, a welcome escape from the chaos of everyday life.
A visit here is worthwhile — you may uncover an artistic soul you never knew you had.
